 Why: Marketing is foundational to driving player engagement: from onboarding new players, reactivating players and nudging active players towards monetization. At King we rely on a combination of third party tools including Braze to work seamlessly with our internal data and Live Ops capabilities. Robust marketing technology reduces friction, supports tentpole events such as All Stars alternative payments and ensures long-term growth in player lifetime value. This role contributes to a virtual team that aims to deliver exceptional, enjoyable and personal experiences to our player base, enabled through technology and an internal operating model that prioritise scalability, collaboration and speed-to-market.
   

  

**Key Activities:**
* Modernize marketing technology and supporting systems to support marketeers’ needs for automated, scalable consumer messaging with high reliability and security.
* Collaborate with Product and Marketing stakeholders to meet evolving business requirements.
* Drive standardization and platform-wide adoption of core marketing technology and tools.


**Potential Success Metrics:**
* 30% reduction in setup time for marketing campaigns across games.
* Player engagement uplift tied to new marketing technology capabilities and data connectivity.
* Internal NPS from game teams on marketeer experience.
* Increased productivity per FTE and Elevate daily work (# of campaigns able to be supported)
* Improved time-to-market for innovation (# of new features built, Reduced time-to-value) and overall Rate of Improvement


**Goal 2: Deliver data connections between King and Third-Party systems to improve overall reporting and attribution for all CRM activity and improve automation capabilities
 *(managing dependencies on contributing teams)***
 What: Ensure we build and maintain APIs and services enabling data connectivity in alignment with Candy CRM and Shared Tech Live Ops needs.
   

  

 Why: Availability of data via our Marketing Tech Platform including third-party tools is essential for triggering marketing comms to players and for reporting on campaign effectiveness. A scalable and reusable approach is required and will reduce duplication across games.
   

  

**Key Activities:**
* Design and oversee a unified data-exchange contract between Unified Platform (UP) services and Braze, defining events, attributes, and consent flags.
* Build real-time and batch pipelines that make gameplay, economy, and segmentation data available to marketeers within defined SLAs.
* Expose self-serve APIs & SDKs so game teams can push new data attributes or subscribe to downstream campaign results without bespoke work.
* Orchestrate cross-domain architecture reviews with Game Platform Core Data and Live Ops to ensure reuse of identity, consent, and compliance components (GDPR/CCPA).
* Automate data-quality monitoring & alerting (e.g., schema drift, null rates, PII violations) and ensure proactive monitoring for stakeholders.
* Pilot advanced attribution & suppression logic (multi-touch, channel fatigue) and document playbooks for marketers.


**Potential Success Metrics:**
- Increased scale of activity (ratio of personalised vs bulk comms.)

 < 5 % schema-drift incidents/quarter detected by automated monitoring.
 - 50 % reduction in manual data-mapping effort for new campaigns (measured via onboarding surveys).

- Marketeer NPS +20 points for “data availability & reliability” dimension versus prior baseline.

- Responsibilities

**Define & Communicate the Engineering Strategy for Marketing & Promotions**
 Develop a cohesive vision and execution plan across the two teams to deliver scalable, compliant, and game-integrated systems. Align this strategy with Shared Tech’s mission of player-centricity, and King’s business goals of enabling trusted and engaging player experiences.
   

  

**Drive Cross-Domain Collaboration and Integration**
 Ensure that Marketing and Promotions systems are interoperable with Game Systems, Live Ops, Economy, and Player Data. Partner across functions to break silos and accelerate safe, secure game delivery.
   

  

**Champion Operational Excellence And Developer Experience**
 Embed high standards of automation, observability, and reliability. Reduce manual overhead for game teams by standardizing integrations and platform contracts. Actively improve onboarding and usage of Social and Identity APIs.
   

  

**Enable Scalable Infrastructure**
 Lead engineering delivery of systems that abstract regulatory complexity away from game teams. Partner with CRM and PXO stakeholders to turn requirements into resilient technical capabilities.
   

  

**Foster a High-Performance, Supportive Engineering Culture**
 Recruit, grow, and retain top engineering talent. Promote psychological safety, autonomy, and continuous feedback. Create an inclusive culture where experimentation, knowledge sharing, and accountability thrive.
   

  

* Essential Knowledge


**Marketing Technology and Live Games as a Service**
 Deep understanding of consumer marketing technologies (Braze, Swrve or competitors), secure data management, and Live Ops strategies across devices and platforms.
   

  

**MarTech Engineering**
 Proven ability to build backend services at scale to engage global audiences. Familiarity with MarTech trends and global data privacy regulations.
   

  

**Backend Scalability & Operability**
 Demonstrated experience building high-volume, high-availability services with strong observability, alerting, and recovery practices.
   

  

* Key Skills
* Technical Strategy & System Architecture: Ability to architect and guide complex distributed systems across identity, compliance, and social domains.
* Cross-Functional Alignment: Skilled at aligning Legal, Product, Engineering, and Game teams behind a unified technical direction.
* Execution Excellence & Flow Efficiency: Strong delivery leadership with focus on rapid iteration, automation, and shortening cycle times without sacrificing quality.
* Organizational Leadership & Coaching: A leader of leaders, able to grow engineering managers and build a resilient, high-trust engineering culture.
* Change Management & Communication: Comfortable navigating ambiguity, aligning diverse stakeholders, and communicating complex concepts clearly at all levels.


**About King**
 With a mission of
 *Making the World Playful* 
 , King is a leading interactive entertainment company with more than 20 years of history of delivering some of the world’s most iconic games in the mobile gaming industry, including the world-famous Candy Crush franchise, as well as other mobile game hits such as
 *Farm Heroes Sag* 
 a. King games are played by more than 200 million monthly active users. King, part of Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT), has Kingsters in Stockholm, Malmö, London, Barcelona, Berlin, Dublin, San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles and Malta. More information can be found at King.com or by following us on LinkedIn, @lifeatking on Instagram, or @king\_games on X.

title: Senior Integration Lead Developer
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Vill du vara med i Sveriges vassaste integrations-team? Då är du rätt person för oss! Nu söker vi Dig som vill jobba som Integration Lead Developer på CGI.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig som har ett brinnande intresse för integrationsutveckling på Microsoft-plattformen att börja i ett team som arbetar tätt tillsammans. Normalt sitter vi ihop och arbetar från vårt kontor i Stadshagen. Vi arbetar med spännande kunder i alla branscher vilket gör att du ständigt får nya utmaningar och möjlighet att vidareutvecklas.
   

  

 På CGI strävar vi efter att skapa framgångsrika team som har roligt på jobbet och hjälper varandra att utvecklas. CGI är Sveriges ledande IT-företag och ett av världens största. Detta ger fantastiska karriärmöjligheter och möjlighet till spännande uppdrag. Vårt framgångsrika integrationsteam är som ett eget litet företag inom ramarna för stora CGI vilket ger en stark teamkänsla och samhörighet.
   

  

 CGI är Microsoft Gold Partner inom Application Integration. Vårt integrationsteam i Stockholm går för högvarv och behöver förstärkning. Här får Du möjlighet att jobba med några av de bästa integrationsutvecklarna i branschen!
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

* Utveckla robusta, säkra och återanvändbara integrationslösningar med hjälp av Azure Integration Services: Logic Apps, Azure Service Bus, API Management, Event Grid och Azure Functions
* Leda tekniska designdiskussioner, definiera integrationsmönster och bidra till lösningsarkitekturen
* Fungera som teknisk ledare för integrationsprojekt och säkerställa överensstämmelse med affärs- och IT-strategier
* Samarbeta nära med lösningsarkitekter, företagsarkitekter och affärsintressenter
* Mentorera och stödja junior-/mellannivåutvecklare och främja bästa praxis och kodkvalitet
* Driva implementeringen av DevOps och automatiseringsmetoder för integrationspipelines (CI/CD, Infrastructure as Code)
* Övervaka integrationsprestanda och proaktivt identifiera förbättringar
* Äga hela livscykeln för integrationer – från kravinsamling till produktionssupport


 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har:
   

  

* 5 till 8+ års erfarenhet i integrationsutveckling, med stark erfarenhet av att designa och implementera lösningar på Azure iPaas
* Djupgående kunskaper om Azure Logic Apps, Service Bus, API Management, Azure Functions, Event Grid och hybridanslutningsalternativ
* Bevisad meritlista inom design av API-baserade arkitekturer, eventdrivna flöden och molnbaserade integrationer
* Stark kunskap om autentiseringsmekanismer (OAuth 2.0, OpenID Connect, Azure AD) och bästa praxis för säkerhet i integrationer
* Kunskaper inom CI/CD-pipelines (helst med Azure DevOps)
* Erfarenhet av övervaknings- och observationsverktyg (t.ex. App Insights, Log Analytics)
* Stark förståelse för integrationsmönster, mikrotjänster och tjänsteorienterad arkitektur (SOA)
* Utmärkta kommunikations-, ledarskaps- och intressenthanteringsfärdigheter
* Kunskap om docker och containers
* Obehindrad svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


 Meriterande om du också har:
   

  

* Microsoft-certifieringar (t.ex. Azure Solutions Architect, Azure Developer Associate)
* Erfarenhet av att integrera med SAP, Dynamics 365, Salesforce eller andra on-premise system
* Kännedom om BizTalk-migreringar till Azure eller strategier för modernisering av integrationer
* Exponering för dataströmningsplattformar (t.ex. Kafka, Event Hubs)
* Bakgrund inom agila/Scrum-metoder


**Vad du kan förvänta dig av oss:**
 Integrationsteamet på CGI är ett gäng som trivs ihop, delar kunskap och stöttar varandra. Här är det lätt att vara sig själv, och det finns alltid någon att bolla idéer med. Ibland gör vi något kul tillsammans efter jobbet, som en spelkväll – bara om man vill, såklart!
   

  

**Låter det intressant?**
 Vi ser fram emot att höra ifrån dig! Skicka in din ansökan redan i dag då urvalet sker löpande. Har du frågor om rollen, kontakta gärna rekryterande konsultchef Ramya Parthasarathy, ramya.parthasarathy@cgi.com eller konsultchef Henrik Sjöstedt, henrik,sjostedt@cgi.com.
   

  

**Vad CGI erbjuder dig**
 CGIs kombination av global och lokal närvaro, med kontor på 30 orter i Sverige, ger nöjda kunder men innebär även att du som anställd alltid har ett kontor nära dig. Detta i kombination med flexibla arbetstider ger dig möjlighet till balans mellan privatliv och arbete, oavsett var i livet just du befinner dig.
   

  

 På CGI finns även stora möjligheter till interna karriärvägar där du kan välja att bli specialist inom ditt område, bredda dig inom nya områden eller ta en ledande befattning. Via våra interna nätverk, projekt och åtaganden i globala och nationella industrier, erbjuder vi dig kompetensutveckling och engagerade ledare som stöttar just dig i din utveckling.
   

  

 Mer information om våra förmåner:
   

  

* Aktieprogram och delägarskap: Som delägare har du möjlighet att påverka och i vårt aktieprogram matchar CGI ditt bidrag, krona för krona upp till 3% av din månadslön.
* Friskvårdsbidrag: Vi erbjuder ett årligt friskvårdsbidrag på 4000 kr.
* Föräldralön: Vi betalar upp till cirka 90% av din lön under den första tiden hemma.
* Trygg anställning: Våra konsulter anställs med kollektivavtal och försäkringar.
* Pensionslösningar: Vi erbjuder attraktiva och förmånliga pensionslösningar.
* Personalbil: Personalbilen används som en privatbil men leasas av CGI.


**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: Senior React Native Engineer
description:
Since our inception in 2017, Anyfin has empowered thousands across Sweden, Finland, Germany, and Norway to manage their finances better, saving millions through smart refinancing options. We’re growing rapidly and have big ambitions on the horizon, with new markets to explore and impactful products to launch. To fuel our mission, we’re seeking a dedicated and talented Senior React Native Engineer who’s ready to create seamless and innovative digital experiences for our users across web and mobile platforms.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 As a
 **Senior React Native Engineer** 
 at Anyfin, you’ll take a leading role in shaping and advancing our mobile applications, ensuring they are performant, delightful, and impactful. You will collaborate closely with designers, backend engineers, and product managers to deliver world-class mobile experiences across iOS and Android.
   

  

**Here’s How You’ll Contribute**
**Mobile Feature Development:** 
 Lead the design, development, and maintenance of new features in our mobile apps using
 **React Native** 
 . You’ll build reusable, high-quality components and modules that enable scalability and accelerate development across platforms.
   

  

**UI Implementation:** 
 Partner closely with our design team to deliver pixel-perfect, accessible interfaces. You’ll ensure a consistent and polished look and feel, leveraging
 **styled-components and Storybook** 
 to maintain a cohesive visual language.
   

  

**API Integration:** 
 Integrate with our
 **GraphQL API** 
 and manage data flows effectively to power seamless user experiences. You will ensure robust client-server communication and optimize app performance.
   

  

**Architecture & Code Quality:** 
 Drive architectural decisions and uphold best practices for code quality, maintainability, and performance. You will champion
 **TypeScript** 
 to ensure quality, security, and clarity across the codebase.
   

  

**Mentorship & Technical Leadership:** 
 Support and mentor less-experienced engineers, fostering knowledge sharing and skill development. You’ll guide code reviews, contribute to technical strategy, and help set standards for mobile development.
   

  

**Experimentation & Continuous Improvement:** 
 Collaborate with product teams to design and implement experiments with Growth Book, iterating on features to improve engagement and retention. You’ll proactively identify areas for enhancement and drive initiatives to elevate the mobile experience.
   

  

**Testing & Reliability** 
 Develop and maintain a comprehensive suite of automated tests to ensure stability, reliability, and confidence in every release.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You are an experienced
 **React Native Engineer** 
 with a proven track record of delivering high-quality mobile applications. You have deep expertise in
 **React Native** 
 , and modern JavaScript frameworks.
   

  

 You are passionate about creating beautiful, performant apps and understand the nuances of developing for both iOS and Android. You enjoy collaborating closely with designers to bring rich user experiences to life and have a keen eye for detail and polish.
   

  

 You are comfortable making architectural decisions, advocating for best practices, and mentoring others to help them grow. You are curious and proactive, always looking for ways to improve the product, streamline workflows, and ensure technical excellence.
   

  

 Above all, you thrive in an environment where learning, collaboration, and continuous improvement are celebrated.
   

  

**Why Join Us?**
 At Anyfin, you’ll find a team driven by purpose, curiosity, and a shared ambition to make a difference. We promise a challenging and rewarding journey that will sharpen your skills, expand your creativity, and allow you to work on meaningful projects. Plus, enjoy the benefits of a centrally-located Stockholm office, competitive compensation, extra time off on your birthday, and many other perks we’ll share when we meet!
   

  

 Are you ready to help us revolutionize financial well-being for all?
   

  

 Apply today, and let’s build something amazing together. We believe that innovation thrives in person, so we work from the office four days a week to foster collaboration and creativity.
   

  

***Please note that we are not offering relocation support for this position.***
 Anyfin is a fintech on a mission to simplify loan repayments and improve the financial well-being of millions. We help consumers reduce the costs of high-interest loans, and take control of their repayment plan.

title: Game Programmer - Hearts of Iron
description:
Paradox Studio Gold is looking for an experienced Game Programmer to join our team.
   

  

 In this role you will take charge of defining and implementing technical solutions to gameplay needs creating new features and systems and updating existing ones.
   

  

 You will be part of an interdisciplinary team effort and work for the shared goal of creating new and deep strategic gameplay with an eye on our player’s motivations and experience.
   

  

 You are trusted with defining, estimating and owning your contributions to the game and the team with autonomy, initiative and creativity to help achieve a great final product.
   

  

 The ideal candidate has an interest in creating user-focused systems and is driven to iterate. They are willing to involve themselves and provide ideas and solutions in all the different aspects that make a great strategy game such as systems, ui, graphics, multiplayer and more.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Build and maintain large c++ codebases with high standards of stability and performance.
* Contribute to design and implement the different game features and the tools to efficiently create the best content for them.
* Balance system flexibility and scriptability with performance and stability.
* Own your work and strive to make it the best it can be within itself and as part of the larger game.
* Constantly look for ways to grow as a professional and help others do the same.


**Skills**
* 5+ years of C++ game programming.
* Experience creating test and content creation tools.
* Comfortable communication in written and spoken English.
* Good communication skills both in person and in documentation.
* Autonomy and initiative within collaborative environments in long term projects for teams big and small.


 If you are willing to pour your passion, technical and collaborative skills into exploring new ways of creating deep history based strategic gameplay experiences send us your application!
   

  

 Today, Paradox consists of both publishing and internal game development. We have a broad portfolio of games and own the most important brands, including Stellaris, Europa Universalis, Hearts of Iron, Crusader Kings, Cities: Skylines, Prison Architect, Victoria, Age of Wonders and the World of Darkness catalog of brands.
   

  

 Since 2004, the company has published its games all over the world, initially through physical distribution but primarily in digital channels after 2006. Paradox games are developed primarily for PC and console platforms, but the company also releases games on mobile. The largest markets today include the US, UK, China, Germany, France and Scandinavia. In total, Paradox games have over five million players each month.

title: Sales Engineering Manager, Benelux & Nordics
description:
About Us:  

We are the leader in human-centric cybersecurity. Half a million customers, including 87 of the Fortune 100, rely on Proofpoint to protect their organizations. We’re driven by a mission to stay ahead of bad actors and safeguard the digital world. Join us in our pursuit to defend data and protect people.  

How We Work:  

At Proofpoint, you’ll be part of a global team that breaks barriers to redefine cybersecurity, guided by our BRAVE core values: Bold in how we dream and innovate, Responsive to feedback, challenges, and opportunities, Accountable for results and best-in-class outcomes, Visionary in future-focused problem-solving, Exceptional in execution and impact.
Company Overview
At Proofpoint, we have a passion for protecting people, data, and brands from today’s advanced threats and compliance risks. We hire the best people in the business to:* Build and enhance our proven human-centric security platform
* Blend innovation and speed in a constantly evolving cloud architecture
* Analyze new threats and offer deep insight through data-driven intel and artificial intelligence
* Collaborate with customers to help solve their toughest security challenges
  

We are singularly devoted to helping our customers protect what matters most – their people and their data. That’s why we’re a leader in next-generation cybersecurity—and why 85% of the Fortune 100 trust us as a security partner.  

The Role
Proofpoint is seeking an experienced and dynamic Sales Engineering (SE) Manager to develop a successful Enterprise franchise in partnership with the Regional Sales leader. You will lead and develop a team of talented sales engineers across Benelux & Nordics, with the key objectives of building pipeline, winning new and add-on business and developing happy customers on our Human-centric security platform. This individual will be a major contributor to our aggressive growth plans for the region and should ideally be located in Denmark or Sweden.  

Your day-to-day* Partner closely with the Regional Sales leader to build a strategy for growth and execute on it
* Accountability of all technical sales and satisfaction activities in the region, including formulating strategies to penetrate target accounts and expanding existing customers
* Highly engaged with customers, including evangelizing the Proofpoint vision at all levels, from technical to C-suite executives
* Attract, hire and retain top talent to support our rapid growth, including developing and mentoring team members to help them achieve their career goals, ideally here at Proofpoint
* Coach, enable, and develop a team of elite Sales Engineers in the key areas of *Product and Technical Expertise*, *Owning the Technical Sales Process*, *Valued Solutions that Deliver Outcomes* and behaving as a *T**rusted Advisor*
* Foster a culture of continual learning, information sharing and collaboration amongst the team to keep all team members current on the latest innovations and build wisdom from recent customer engagements
* Actively collaborate with key internal stakeholders such as product, channel, customer success, marketing, services and support to build pipeline and ensure customer loyalty
* Engage and sponsor key local channel partners that support your business
* Encourage, initiate and execute local initiatives to grow the business
* The role is highly customer and partner facing and will require ~50% travel within the region
  

What you bring to the team* Leadership & initiative – a motivated self-starter brimming with ideas, with the discipline and drive to execute on them to yield the desired outcomes
* A mature technically astute but business centric engineer with a proven ability to command a room, guide complex technical and business conversations with C-suite executives, as well as technical staff
* A commercially savvy technical sales leader who can partner effectively with sales leadership to develop and grow the business
* Proven experience of managing sales engineering teams, ideally in the cyber-security industry based on extensive previous experience as a sales engineer
* Track record of mentoring and developing team members and guiding them to success
* A strong collaborator with internal and external stakeholders, with a willingness to actively engage in discovering opportunities and problem solving at a technical level
* Ability to thrive in a fast paced, high energy sales environment
* Degree in Computer Science preferred or equivalent IT experience
* An excellent communicator and presenter with fluency in English and either Swedish, Danish or Dutch
  

Why Proofpoint
Protecting people is at the heart of our award-winning cybersecurity solutions, and the people who work here are the key to our success. We’re a customer-focused and driven-to-win organisation with leading-edge products. We are an inclusive, diverse, multinational company that believes in culture fit, but more importantly ‘culture-add’, and we strongly encourage people from all walks of life to apply.  

We believe in hiring the best and the brightest to help cultivate our culture of collaboration and appreciation. Apply today and explore your future at Proofpoint! #LifeAtProofpoint #LI-MC4
Why Proofpoint? At Proofpoint, we believe that an exceptional career experience includes a comprehensive compensation and benefits package. Here are just a few reasons you’ll love working with us:* Competitive compensation
* Comprehensive benefits
* Learning & Development: We are committed to the growth and development of our team members, offering a range of programs including leadership and professional development workshops, stretch project assignments, and mentoring opportunities to help employees reach their full potential.
* Flexible work environment: [Remote options, hybrid schedules, flexible hours, etc.].
* Annual wellness and community outreach days
* Always on recognition for your contributions
* Global collaboration and networking opportunities


Our Culture:
Our culture is rooted in values that inspire belonging, empower purpose and drive success-every day, for everyone. We encourage applications from individuals of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. If you need accommodation during the application or interview process, please reach out to accessibility@proofpoint.com. How to Apply Interested? Submit your application here https://www.proofpoint.com/us/company/careers. We can’t wait to hear from you!
company_description: Proofpoint helps organizations protect their people. Our integrated, cloud-based suite of people-centric compliance and security solutions helps mitigate today’s security and compliance risks.

title: Digitaliseringskonsult inom Microsoft Cloud, Automation & Säkerhet
description:
*Vill du forma och optimera morgondagens IT-miljöer med hjälp av Microsofts ekosystem – och samtidigt skapa verklig nytta för användare och verksamhet? Vi söker en digitaliseringskonsult som blir en nyckelspelare i vårt team, där teknik, säkerhet och automation kombineras för att driva våra kunder framåt i deras digitala resa.*

 **Om rollen**


Som digitaliseringskonsult får du ett brett och varierat uppdrag – från verksamhetsutveckling och automatisering till säkerhetslösningar och teknisk arkitektur. Du bidrar både till utvecklingen av kundernas miljöer och till teamets gemensamma kompetens. Rollen innebär nära samarbete med kunder och stort eget ansvar, både i projekt och i dagligt förbättringsarbete.

 **Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**

* Digitalisering och effektivisering inom Microsoft 365 och Azure.
* Automatisering med PowerShell, Logic Apps och Power Platform.
* Uppsättning och hantering av Microsoft Entra ID och Intune.
* Implementering och drift av säkerhetslösningar inom Microsoft Defender-familjen.
* Klienthantering, dokumentation, onboardingflöden och systemutvärdering.
* Applikationspaketering, övervakning och teknisk felsökning.
* Lösningsarkitektur och projektledning i varierade kunduppdrag.

**Din profil**

Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet inom någon av följande områden:

  

* Microsoft Entra ID (f.d. Azure AD), Microsoft Intune.
* Conditional Access, PowerShell, Power Platform (inkl. Power Automate & AI Builder), Azure Logic Apps.
* Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps, Microsoft Defender for Identity, Microsoft Defender for Office 365.
* Microsoft Teams, SharePoint Online, Exchange Online, Windows 11, Microsoft Loop, samt andra verktyg för systemadministration och RMM.

**Din profil**


Du har ett starkt tekniskt driv, är nyfiken och vill hela tiden utvecklas. Du trivs med frihet under ansvar, samarbetar gärna men kan också driva egna projekt. Det är viktigare att du har viljan att växa och bidra till kundernas framgång än att du kan allt redan från start.

 **Utvecklingsmöjligheter hos kunden:**

* Möjlighet att certifiera dig inom Microsofts plattformar.
* Delta i interna kompetenslyft och externa utbildningar.
* Arbeta i varierande projekt som utmanar och utvecklar dig tekniskt.
* Utbyta kunskap med kollegor med djup spetskompetens.

**Därför vill du jobba hos kunden:**

* Nyckelroll i ett högkompetent team med stark laganda.
* Variation i arbetsuppgifter och tekniker.
* Möjlighet att påverka tekniska lösningar och arbetssätt.
* Ett hjälpsamt team med humor och kunskapsdelning.
* Bas på kontoret i Norrköping med möjlighet till distansarbete vid behov.

**Ansökan**


Vårt Talent Acquisition team ser gärna att du som söker har goda referenser samt ett välarbetat CV där du specificerat tidigare kunskap och/eller utbildning inom området. Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar alla sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete. Vi tar endast emot ansökningar via vårt system. Upplever du problem eller har frågor kontakta emma@linden-it.se eller maria@linden-it.se

title: Solution Specialist - Microsoft Security Suite
description:
**Do you want to be at the forefront of protecting our society against cyber threats? We are looking for a Solution Specialist in Microsoft Security Suite to team up with the most dedicated team of cyber specialists in our** **Managed Security Services****.**

##### **About Truesec – A Leading Cybersecurity Company**


Since 2005, Truesec has been a native cybersecurity company, driven by one single purpose: Creating safety and sustainability in a digital world by preventing cyber breach and minimizing impact.


Over the years, we’ve earned the trust of organizations worldwide and gained a strong reputation internationally. Our team consists of dedicated specialists covering the entire spectrum of cybersecurity – with capabilities in Predict, Prevent, Protect, Respond, and Recover.


Today, we employ around 400 employees – and as cybercrime grows, we need to grow. To support that goal, we are now looking for a Solution Specialist in Microsoft Security Suite to our Detection Solutions team**,** who wants to make a difference in our Managed Security Services domain.

##### **The Role**


Join our Detection Solutions team as a Solution Specialist in Microsoft Security Suite, where you’ll take ownership of the technical landscape across Microsoft security products. This hybrid role blends technical cyber security expertise with both internal and external enablement, ensuring our Microsoft security platforms are optimally configured, up-to-date, and fully leveraged by our Security Operations teams and our customers.


In this role, you will:

* Act as the technical platform specialist for Microsoft security solutions, including Defender for Endpoint, Defender for Identity, Defender for Cloud, Microsoft Sentinel, and related security components.
* Monitor, assess, and communicate updates, new features, and licensing changes from Microsoft to ensure our security capabilities remain cutting-edge.
* Enable and educate - share your expertise by keeping SOC analysts and internal stakeholders up to date on the latest platform developments, detection opportunities, and best practices. Translate complex updates into actionable guidance and ensure knowledge is embedded in our processes.
* Work closely with Microsoft, engineering teams, and internal stakeholders to troubleshoot issues, optimize deployments, and increase detection and response capabilities, representing the Detection Solutions team with clarity and credibility.
* Drive ongoing enhancements across our Microsoft security tooling and processes, ensuring that new platform capabilities are rapidly and effectively integrated.

##### **Your Potential Background**


We are looking for someone with a passion for cybersecurity, a strong sense of product ownership, and a collaborative mindset. You thrive in a dynamic environment, are eager to stay current with the latest Microsoft technologies and enjoy sharing your expertise with others. You have 2-5 years of hands-on experience in cybersecurity, ideally as a product specialist within Microsoft Security Suit, Technical Account Manager, or similar roles.

**Required Skills:**

* Deep familiarity with Microsoft Security Suite, including deployment strategies and advanced technical capabilities within Microsoft Defender, Sentinel, and related security products.
* Experience with operationalizing Microsoft security solutions.
* Strong interest in technical product ownership, with a proactive approach to learning and staying current with evolving Microsoft security features and best practices.
* Ability to communicate complex technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Collaborative and outgoing personality; comfortable representing the team in cross-functional meetings, vendor dialogues, and technical customer discussions.
* Self-motivated, with a proven ability to work independently.

**Bonus points if you have:**

* Knowledge about Microsoft licensing models.
* Experience writing detection rules, configuring automated workflows, or working with API integrations within Microsoft security products.
* Microsoft certifications (e.g., SC-200, MS-500, AZ-500) or equivalent practical experience.
* Previous experience working in a SOC or MSSP environment.

*Due to the sensitivity in our assignments, we require Swedish citizenship, citizenship in an EU country, or a Swedish work permit.*

##### **Join Our Mission Toward a Safe Digital Future**


If you truly want to make a difference and make our world a little bit safer, this is the place for you. At Truesec, you'll get to be at the forefront of fighting cybercrime instead of reading about it in the news. This is your chance to be part of an exciting journey in a leading cybersecurity company - and learn from some of the best in their field.


So, are you ready to team up with the most dedicated team of experts and be part of a meaningful mission? Then we are excited to get to know you!

title: Expert inom SAP - Stockholm
description:
**Uppdragsbeskrivning**


Vi söker en expert inom SAP S/4 Public Cloud för att driva och implementera lösningar inom produktionsredovisning. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att säkerställa att systemlösningarna möter verksamhetens behov och att effektivisera processerna för våra kunder.

**Kvalifikationer:**

* Omfattande erfarenhet av SAP S/4 Public Cloud, särskilt inom produktionsredovisning, med djup förståelse för funktionalitet och processer.
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att framgångsrikt implementera SAP-lösningar i flera fabriker, gärna i minst fem olika produktionsanläggningar.
* En skarp och resultatdriven profil, med förmåga att hantera komplexa projekt och bidra till effektiv systemintegration.
* Förmåga att arbeta nära verksamheten och anpassa lösningarna efter specifika behov, samtidigt som du säkerställer hög kvalitet och leveransprecision.


Denna roll är idealisk för dig som vill ta nästa steg i din karriär och vara en central del i att forma och förbättra verksamhetens SAP-lösningar på en global nivå.  

  

**Startdatum**: 2025-11-04

**Ansök senast**: 20 oktober 2025

 **Om Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting är ett specialiserat bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag inom IT-sektorn. Vi samarbetar med ledande tech-bolag och innovativa startupföretag för att erbjuda spännande karriärmöjligheter för dig med intresse för digital utveckling. Genom vår djupa tekniska förståelse och vårt starka nätverk kan vi snabbt matcha rätt kompetenser med rätt uppdrag. Hos oss får du personlig vägledning, regelbunden återkoppling och möjligheten att ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär.

title: Machine Learning Engineer - Stockholm
description:
**GCP Requirements:**

* **Vertex AI & Kubeflow Pipelines:** Experience working with Vertex AI pipelines or Kubeflow pipelines, driving the orchestration of machine learning workflows in a cloud-native environment.
* **BigQuery:** Strong familiarity with BigQuery for large-scale data querying, capable of writing optimized SQL queries.
* **Cloud Composer / Airflow:** Proficiency in managing data workflows with Cloud Composer or Apache Airflow, ensuring smooth orchestration and scheduling of tasks.
* **IAM & Service Accounts:** Deep understanding of Identity and Access Management (IAM) and working with service accounts to manage permissions securely.
* **Data Catalog:** Familiar with Google Cloud Data Catalog, enabling data governance, metadata management, and discovery across various datasets.
* **Infrastructure as Code (IaC):** Practical understanding of Infrastructure as Code principles, ensuring the automation and scalability of cloud resources.
* **Bonus Knowledge:** Familiarity with Dataflow and Kubernetes (K8s) for streamlining data processing and container orchestration.

**Cloud-Agnostic Skills:**

* **Python:** Expertise in Python programming with a solid foundation in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and coding best practices. Experience with tools like **flake8**, **mypy**, **black**, **SonarQube**, and **pre-commit** for code quality and formatting.
* **Testing:** Advanced knowledge of unit and end-to-end testing, with experience using frameworks such as **Pytest**, **fixtures**, and **unittest** to ensure reliable and maintainable code.
* **Unix:** Comfortable with Unix-based systems, with practical experience in installing software within Docker containers and working with shell scripting.
* **Git:** Proficient in using Git, including creating Pull Requests (PRs), resolving merge conflicts, and managing version control. Ability to set up CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions** following industry best practices.
* **Docker:** Strong understanding of containerization with Docker, enabling smooth deployment and scaling of applications.
* **DBT:** Expertise in Data Build Tool (DBT), preferably in a Google Cloud environment, for managing and transforming data pipelines efficiently.
* **SQL & Data Modeling:** Profound knowledge of SQL and data modeling techniques, as well as system design principles, to ensure high-quality, scalable data architecture.

**Soft Skills:**

* **Problem-Solving Mindset:** A proactive approach to tackling challenges, with a strong ability to learn new technologies quickly. Resourcefulness and a solution-oriented mindset, such as knowing how to effectively research and resolve unfamiliar issues.
* **Communication:** Excellent communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with both stakeholders and technical teams, bridging the gap between business needs and technical requirements.
* **Code Review & Feedback:** A strong advocate for code quality, including conducting thorough code reviews and embracing constructive feedback to continuously improve the development process.

**Additional Experience (Merit):**

* Previous experience working with high-availability APIs, machine learning-based recommendation systems, and personalization engines is a plus. This is particularly relevant for teams focusing on customer-facing recommendation systems.


This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge projects while working in a collaborative environment, driving innovative solutions with the latest cloud technologies.

 **About** **Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting is a specialized staffing and recruitment firm focused on the IT sector. We collaborate with leading tech companies and innovative startups to provide exciting career opportunities for individuals passionate about digital development. With our deep technical expertise and extensive network, we efficiently match the right talents with the right assignments. At Rasulson Consulting, you’ll receive personalized guidance, regular feedback, and the chance to take the next step in your IT career.

title: CRM Specialist
description:
**Assignment Overview**


We are looking for a skilled CRM Specialist to take on an exciting role focused on enhancing customer analytics and optimizing data-driven decision-making. This position involves creating scalable forecasting models using Power BI, conducting detailed customer segmentation, and refining Salesforce data structures. Additionally, you will be tasked with defining key performance indicators (KPIs) for customer loyalty, analyzing customer behavior patterns, and mapping out customer journeys with corresponding KPI metrics. A key component of this role will also include migrating dashboards and reports to a new data lake, ensuring a smooth transition and better data management.


In this role, you will work with cross-functional teams to leverage customer data insights for driving impactful business strategies. You’ll be expected to take ownership of the data architecture and reporting framework, ensuring that the tools and systems in place facilitate actionable insights that contribute to the company's broader goals.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop scalable forecasting models using Power BI to predict customer behavior and trends, supporting business decision-making.
* Lead the process of customer segmentation by utilizing advanced data analytics to create clear, actionable categories that enhance marketing strategies.
* Refine and optimize Salesforce data structures, ensuring seamless integration and data flow across platforms.
* Define and track customer loyalty KPIs, ensuring they align with organizational goals and provide clear insights into customer retention and engagement.
* Analyze customer behavior through data-driven approaches and generate meaningful insights to inform strategies for customer engagement.
* Map customer journeys and establish KPIs that effectively measure their experiences and interactions with the business.
* Migrate existing dashboards and reporting systems to a new data lake, ensuring data is well-organized and accessible for business intelligence purposes.
* Collaborate with various departments to ensure that customer data insights are effectively integrated into day-to-day operations and decision-making.

**Required Qualifications:**

* Proven proficiency in data visualization and reporting tools such as Power BI and Qlik Sense, with the ability to build intuitive, user-friendly dashboards and reports.
* A strong academic background in data science, statistics, computer science, mathematics, or a related field, providing a solid foundation for complex data analysis.
* Extensive hands-on experience with Salesforce CRM and Salesforce Marketing Cloud, with a deep understanding of how these systems can drive business strategies.
* Advanced knowledge of SQL, including the ability to manipulate large datasets, perform complex queries, and transform data to support reporting and analysis.
* Exceptional analytical skills, with a keen eye for detail and the ability to identify trends, anomalies, and actionable insights from large datasets.
* Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to present complex data insights in a clear and concise manner to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
* Demonstrated experience in CRM analytics, customer segmentation, and interpreting customer data to enhance customer retention and engagement strategies.
* It is a distinct advantage if you have experience working within Salesforce environments, including familiarity with advanced data visualization techniques and cloud-based solutions like Azure.
* Experience in migrating reporting tools and dashboards to cloud-based data lakes and optimizing data architecture for business intelligence purposes is highly beneficial.


This role offers the opportunity to significantly impact customer experience strategies by leveraging data and analytics. If you are passionate about CRM systems, data analytics, and creating impactful business strategies through data-driven insights, we invite you to apply.  

  

**Startdatum**: ASAP

**Slutdatum**: 2025-12-31

**Ansök senast**: 6 oktober 2025

 **About** **Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting is a specialized staffing and recruitment firm focused on the IT sector. We collaborate with leading tech companies and innovative startups to provide exciting career opportunities for individuals passionate about digital development. With our deep technical expertise and extensive network, we efficiently match the right talents with the right assignments. At Rasulson Consulting, you’ll receive personalized guidance, regular feedback, and the chance to take the next step in your IT career.

title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**YOUR MISSION AT VOI**


As a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, you will play a crucial role to design, build and maintain machine learning models for all our business areas. You will work on problems where you will get to utilize your skills in such interrelated disciplines as machine learning, software engineering, data science, data engineering as well as prompt and AI/API engineering. In the end, you will drive and contribute to solutions of some of our key problems around vehicle availability, reliability & safety, user experience personalisation and parking. You will primarily be working in a team focused on predicting the future demand for our vehicles. Specifically where and when they will be needed. Further, you will have a big impact on anticipating and acting early on a vehicle’s maintenance needs, which plays a key role in the good user riding experience.


Your responsibilities will include:

* As an embedded member of a cross-functional product team, you will be responsible for end-to-end machine learning and AI projects. This includes everything from identifying business problems and formulating solution hypotheses, to defining data requirements, prototyping, implementing solutions in production, and measuring their business impact.
* Maintain and improve Voi's machine learning platform to ensure our machine learning products adhere to state-of-the-art MLOps standards, with support from the team
* Work with colleagues to improve team processes and support mutual learning and knowledge sharing

**WHAT YOU NEED TO EMBARK**


We’re looking for a Machine Learning professional with experience from working in a fast-paced environment. In addition to being fluent in English, we believe the right person has:

* Higher education in one of the mathematical sciences such as computer science, mathematics, physics, bioinformatics or with a similar, data centric, degree
* A strong business sense with laser focus on business value and user impact
* Fluency in Python and software engineering in general
* Documented experience in developing production-quality software
* Experience of working with real-time inference and/or MLOps in one of the major cloud environments
* Experience of working on edge machine learning and computer vision is a bonus
* Hands-on contribution to managing projects from start to finish – from tackling business challenges to planning, building, launching, and keeping an eye on the results.

**WHY VOI?**


Working at Voi is more than just a job; Our People Promise includes a personal voyage where you will grow as a professional and be a part of a team and culture that builds something meaningful for society. In addition to this you’ll have the opportunity to:

* Join Europe's #1 micromobility company
* Get “skin in the game” through our employee options program and be a part of building a world class organisation and a scalable ML function
* Enjoy unlimited free Voi ride
* Voi is a multicultural company with employees from all over the world, which is something we value deeply. With a flexible public holiday policy, you have the opportunity to choose which holidays, religious or cultural, you want to celebrate
* We do hackdays and lab days to inspire growth and explore new solutions to problems. We hope to see creative ideas to tackle hard problems that you find important to solve with colleagues outside your inner team.
* While everyone is encouraged to meet their colleagues at the office, we do have a hybrid setup when it comes to remote work in order to find the optimal work-life-balance.
* Join the micromobility-revolution and be a part of creating sustainable cities made for living, free from noise and pollution

title: Senior Analytics Engineer
description:
**Join our global force of 500+ innovators, blending the latest in tech with the greatest in soundtracking, from our Stockholm HQ to offices in London, New York, Los Angeles, Berlin, Oslo, and Seoul. We’re an industry leader with a startup mentality. We take what we do seriously, but we don’t take ourselves too seriously. Creating and collaborating to transform the sound of streaming, content, and culture. Come join us—and let the world feel your work.**  

  

As a Senior Analytics Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the DRM Ingestion Team, which is part of Epidemic Sound’s central Data Engineering organization. Your role will be to build and scale a greenfield data warehouse for large scale social-media music data that will provide critical commercial insights to both internal and external users.

  

The DRM Ingestion Team is responsible for ingesting large-scale music and rights data from social media platforms like YouTube, music rights holders, and other third-party data sources. You will be responsible for transforming and modeling this large-scale data so it can be used to unlock valuable insights into how Epidemic Sound’s music is being used. This is a unique greenfield project where you will have significant influence on the data architecture and tooling for a mission-critical data initiative. This work is key to establishing a new revenue stream and directly informing strategic and commercial decisions across the company.

 **Your key responsibilities include:**

* Build, maintain, and evolve the DRM data warehouse, transforming and modeling large-scale data for a variety of internal and external data consumers.
* Define and implement data architecture and data modeling principles in a greenfield environment.
* Partner closely with other engineers and analytics teams to deliver high-quality, production-ready data products.
* Work directly with business stakeholders to understand requirements and develop solutions that meet their needs.
  

**Requirements**

* Strong experience with dbt or other ELT orchestration tools.
* Expertise in SQL, BigQuery, and data modeling.
* A self-starter attitude, able to take ownership and drive work forward independently.
* Curiosity and passion for extracting value from large-scale data.
* Ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
  

**Nice to have**

* Experience working in smaller companies or early-stage environments, where you’ve taken ownership of data products and worked with rapidly evolving requirements
* Experience with data infrastructure and orchestration
* Experience with dbt Cloud, Airflow, or Apache Beam
* Knowledge of Java, Kotlin, or Go

  

**Equal opportunity employer**  

We believe that bringing people together from different backgrounds, experiences and perspectives makes for a healthy workplace, a more successful business and a better world. We value diversity and encourage everyone to come and soundtrack the world with us.  

  

**Application**  

Ready to make the world feel your work? Please apply, in English, by clicking the link below.

 ***Welcome to Tune In - our behind-the-scenes video series where we sit down with the brilliant minds shaping the sound and story of Epidemic Sound. In this episode Oscar Höglund, CEO and Co-Founder of Epidemic Sound sits down with Rikard Herlitz, Chief Tech Officer where he shares what makes developers most happy, what velocity means to him and how Epidemic Sound is in the sweet spot when it comes to AI.Thinking about joining us? Tune in - and see if we sound like your kind of vibe.***

title: Graphic Communication Co-worker, IKEA Borlänge
description:
* **Job ID:** 311662
* **Date posted:** 04/10/2025
**VEM ÄR DU**  

  

Du har en passion för inredning, kommunikation och grafisk design och vill hjälpa kunden att få en fantastisk upplevelse när de besöker vårt varuhus. Du gillar ditt kompetensområde och vill utveckla din kunskap ytterligare. Som person är du kreativ, händig, strategisk, lyhörd och coachande gentemot dina kollegor. Du kan leda dig själv och är bra på att strukturera ditt arbete. En öppen attityd till nya idéer och världen omkring oss är viktigt.  

Att kunna följa guidelines och satta strategier är en självklarhet för dig, och du gillar att vara kreativ inom en given ram (koncept).  

  

Du tycker om att jobba i högt tempo, prioriterar och implementerar, är en do:er !  

  
* + En formell utbildning (alt erfarenhet) inom området kommunikation, grafisk design, digital publicering, film och ljud är nödvändigt.
	+ Du har en god kompetens i Adobe Creative Cloud, företrädesvis InDesign och Illustrator.
	+ Erfarenhet/kompetens/intresse i användandet av digitala media (Instagram/Twitter etc).
  
* + Du är flytande i svenska, kan obehindrat formulera dig på svenska och engelska i löpande text utifrån olika uppdrag.
  

**Att jobba med oss**  

  

Som Graphic Communications Co-worker på IKEA Borlänge är du del av ett team som har som främsta uppgift att säkra IKEAs grafiska identitet. Det gör vi genom att arbeta med text, bild och form genom hela varuhuset. En vanlig arbetsdag kan du arbeta med allt från storformatsutskrifter och att montera skyltar på en avdelning, till att vid datorn läsa på om framtida grafiska guidelines och sedan utbilda nya medarbetare i IKEAs produkt- och priskommunikation.
  

  

Med ditt starka sinne för struktur, outtröttliga vilja att utbilda dig själv och andra och förmåga att förnya och förbättra samarbetar du med avdelningarna i varuhuset för att hitta de mest hållbara, visuellt konsekventa och lönsamma lösningarna. Välkommen att söka tjänsten där du kan få vara del av ett härligt team som med stor entusiasm och tillsammansanda bidrar till att stärka en unik shoppingupplevelse, varje dag.  

  

En central del i jobbet är flexibilitet, vi hjälps åt, jobbar tillsammans och hugger i där det behövs. Vi har också möjligheter att tidvis hjälpa andra IKEA-enheter när det behövs.  

  

**TILLSAMMANS SOM ETT TEAM**  

  

På IKEA Borlänge har alla medarbetare ett stort engagemang och vi arbetar alla tillsammans för att nå våra mål. Vi vill skapa en bättre vardag för många människor, både för oss själva och för våra kunder. För att nå det målet krävs det medarbetare som står för enkelhet, samhörighet, ödmjukhet, nyfikenhet, och flexibilitet.  

Grafiska teamet vid IKEA Borlänge består av 2 pers, en Graphic Leader och en Graphic Co-worker.  

  

IKEA Borlänge graphic-team har också ett nära samarbete med IKEA Gävle.  

  

**Frågor och support? Låt oss knyta kontakt!**  

  

Tjänsten är på heltid och är ett vikariat t o m 31/5 - 2027 (god chans till förlängning) med tillträde enligt överenskommelse.  

Arbete sker vardagar mellan 7-16 (flex).  

  

Om du har några frågor kring tjänsten vänligen kontakta Anette Högner, Graphic Communication Leader, anette.hogner@ingka.ikea.com .  

Har frågor kring rekryteringsprocessen vänligen kontakta Johan Rosengren, Recruitment & Selection Specialist, johan.rosengren3@ingka.ikea.com.  

Sista ansökningsdag är 19 oktober.  

  

Välkommen med din ansökan!
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Tech Lead
description:
**Position Summary**
 We’re Tacton – a Swedish software company helping the largest manufacturers in the world Configure, Price and send Quotes for their products through our market-leading SaaS tool (ranked #1 by Gartner).
   

  

 We’re looking for a Tech Lead to join us. In this role, you’ll be one of the most senior members of our development team and play a key part in technical decisions, take technical ownership of projects and systems, ensure high-quality code and development processes, while doing hands-on development every day to help build and improve our product.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Write, review, and maintain clean, well-structured Java code.
* Lead and mentor colleagues by sharing your technical expertise.
* Take technical ownership of projects end-to-end, supporting the product development process from concept to delivery.
* Collaborate closely with teammates, sharing ideas, giving feedback, and solving problems together.
* Contribute to system architecture and help shape the long-term technical vision.
* Ensure features work reliably and meet customer needs.
* Remove obstacles, keep the team aligned, and ensure timely delivery.


**Skills And Qualifications**
**Required:**
* At least 7 years’ experience in software development, ideally with experience from product development.
* Strong experience with Java or equivalent technology. Interest in working with Java, as that is our core technology.
* Experience reviewing code, giving colleagues in development feedback, and making technical decisions.
* Experience with taking the lead on technical development initiatives, having responsibility for delivery, and coordinating work with other developers or dev teams.
* Ability to help translate high-level requirements into concrete technical solutions.
* Good communication skills; able to explain technical concepts to both developers and non-developers.
* Fluent in English.
* Collaborative mindset, balancing input with openness to alternative approaches.


**Preferred**
* Experience in B2B SaaS product development and cloud technologies.
* Familiarity with test automation and software best practices.


**Why join Tacton?**
* Work on an industry-leading, business-critical SaaS product used by some of the biggest manufacturing companies in the world.
* Influence technical decisions and the future direction of the product.
* Be part of a skilled and experienced engineering team.
* Hybrid work: Stockholm office, 3 days a week.


**The Recruitment Process Consists Of**
* Screening call with Talent Acquisition
* Logics & personality test (Alva Labs)
* First interview with our hiring manager
* Technical interview
* Interview with our CTO
* Reference check


**About Tacton**
*Tacton is a leading Software as a Service company trusted by global manufacturers. We got started in the late 1990s when six computer scientists figured out a revolutionary way to help Manufacturers overcome their most business-critical, product configuration challenges. Since those early days, we have grown to support global manufacturers seeking to thrive in a changing world.*
*We invite you to find out more about us @* 
*www.tacton.com/about*
 Tacton is a leading SaaS company within CPQ and Design Automation making sales simple for complex products.

title: Data Engineer
description:
Are you ready to be at the forefront of digital innovation? Join our dynamic team at Tele2, where Digital Capabilities & Technology (DCT) is the engine behind our products and services. As the essential enabler of our commercial
   

  

 ambitions, DCT brings automation and simplicity to the telecommunications industry, revolutionizing the way we connect and communicate.
   

  

 Within our organization, you’ll find everything from the backbone infrastructure of technology and IT systems, serving both our external & internal customers, to advanced analytics, AI creation, and frontend development. Our team plays a vital role in ensuring reliable and premium services through delivering exceptional experiences to our end customers, both Consumer and Enterprises, all the while supporting our colleagues within Tele2.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are looking for a Data Pipeline Expert with a track record of +4 years building ingestion and transformation frameworks that can handle large, fast-growing datasets with ease on AWS and Redshift, to join our
 *B2B Data & Analytical* 
 team
 *within IT B2B Billing and Data Services* 
 . The team is today responsible for the development in larger technology programs and projects supporting our B2B customer needs.
   

  

 As a Data Engineer, you will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and optimizing our data pipelines and data products. You will work closely with data scientists, analysts, and other engineers to deliver high-quality, reliable, and efficient data solutions that power business intelligence and analytics initiatives. To succeed in this role, you have a passion for agility, maintain a positive attitude and have the ability to create strong team spirit and relationships across functional teams.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable and efficient data pipelines to extract, transform, and load (ETL) data using Snowflake, Redshift, dbt, Apache Airflow and other cloud-based technologies.
* Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and business stakeholders to understand data needs and design appropriate solutions.
* Build and maintain data models, ensuring data is accurate, consistent, and easily accessible for analytics and reporting.
* Implement modern data transformation tools and frameworks (e.g., dbt, Apache Airflow) to streamline data processing workflows.
* Monitor and troubleshoot data pipeline issues, ensuring high reliability and data quality.

title: Konsultchef - CGI Public & Defense
description:
Beskrivning av tjänsten
   

  

 Observera att efter midsommar kommer ledtiderna för denna tjänst vara lite längre på grund utav semestrar. Vi ämnar att återkoppla så fort vi kan! Har du frågor är du välkommen att mejla susanne.thunman@cgi.com
   

  

 CGI växer och söker nu förstärkning av en konsultchef till vår framgångsrika enhet för offentlig sektor i Stockholmsområdet! Som konsultchef på CGI spelar du en nyckelroll i att utveckla våra kunder, team och kompetenser. CGI:s framgångsrika ”Proximity model” innebär att du som konsultchef på CGI är kundansvarig, ledare och expert – det betyder att du är geografiskt nära både dina kunder och konsulter.
   

  

 Som Director Consulting Services (konsultchef) inom CGI Public & Defense blir du en del av vår ledargrupp som sträcker sig från Stockholm till Värmland.". Vi har en öppen och generös företagskultur och att dela med sig av sin kunskap är en förutsättning för att vi tillsammans ska lyckas med att utveckla vår verksamhet. Vi som arbetar här är drivna och motiverade och för oss är balans i livet en självklarhet.
   

  

 Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter
   

  

 Du kommer att ha övergripande leveransansvar för uppdrag hos dina kunder samt säkerställa att vi levererar med hög kvalitet. Du agerar naturligt som det ”centrala ankaret” i leveranserna mot dina kunder.
   

  

 Genom förståelse för kundernas behov kommer du att aktivt arbeta med sälj- och affärsmöjligheter. Som ledare motiverar och engagerar du dina medarbetare och som kollega bidrar du till vårt team genom din positiva energi och ett lösningsorienterat sinne.
   

  

 Som ledare kommer du att, tillsammans med andra konsultchefer, ha ansvar för affärer hos dina kunder, tillväxt, kompetensutveckling och beläggning. Vidare kommer du att ha resultat- och budgetansvar för dina kunder och även genom proaktivitet leda affärsutvecklingen. En framgångsrik konsultchef på CGI jobbar runt 50% av tiden som expert i fakturerande uppdrag hos kund.
   

  

**I rollen som Director Consulting Services kommer du att arbeta med följande områden:**
* Affärsutveckling – utveckla kundrelationer och identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter.
* Ledarskap – coacha ett team på 15–20 personer och stödja deras utveckling.
* Rekrytering – attrahera och anställa nya konsulter tillsammans med vårt TA-team.
* Operativt ansvar – budget, tillväxtmål, beläggning och lönsamhet.
* Kundarbete – driva uppdrag hos kund cirka 50 % av tiden.
* Ledningsgruppsarbete – bidra aktivt till utvecklingen av hela enheten.
* Branschinsikt – håll dig uppdaterad inom offentlig sektor och teknik.


 Kvalifikationer för att bli framgångsrik denna roll
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av kundansvar och har ett starkt sinne för att driva affär hos våra kunder. Du brinner för ett proaktivt ledarskaps-och affärsansvar. Vi tror att du har ett brett nätverk inom offentlig sektor och IT-branschen och är van att möta kunder och förstå deras verksamheter, utmaningar och möjligheter.
   

  

 För att lyckas i rollen behöver du ha god erfarenhet inom offentlig sektor samt förståelse för hur inköpsprocesserna fungerar hos offentlig sektor i Sverige. Vi tycker att det är viktigt att du är affärsmässig och har förmågan att se kundnyttan. Vi tror att du har erfarenhet av en ledande roll med medarbetar- samt resultatansvar. Din erfarenhet inom IT-området gör att du har lätt för att förstå tekniken och att diskutera kundbehov, som du sedan kopplar till våra tjänster, samt strategisk kompetensutveckling med medarbetare.
   

  

 Du är drivande som person och stimuleras av förändringsarbete; du är en transformativ ledare som motiverar och engagerar dina medarbetare, du har en positiv/kommunikativ läggning och viljestyrka att utveckla såväl verksamhet som medarbetare. Du behärskar svenska och engelska flytande i tal som väl i skrift.
   

  

 Du erbjuds ett utmanande och stimulerande arbete med ansvar att driva gruppen – och enhetens utveckling framåt, tillsammans med ett fantastiskt gäng medarbetare och ledare. Vi arbetar löpande med urval så ansök gärna så snart som möjligt.
   

  

**Låt oss som ägare omvandla verklig insikt till handling – tillsammans.**
 Livet på CGI bygger på ägande, lagarbete, respekt och tillhörighet. Tillsammans med oss kommer du att kunna nå din fulla potential.
   

  

 Du är inbjuden att ta ägandeskap redan från första dagen i vårt arbete med att förverkliga vår dröm om att skapa en arbetsmiljö där vi trivs med att arbeta tillsammans och bidrar till framgången för vårt företag. Det är därför vi kallar oss CGI Partners snarare än anställda. Vi drar nytta av vår kollektiva framgång och tillsammans får vi möjlighet att aktivt forma vår företagsstrategi och inriktning.
   

  

 Ditt arbete skapar värde. Du kommer att vara med att utveckla innovativa lösningar och bygga relationer med medarbetare och kunder samtidigt som du får tillgång till globala möjligheter att skala upp dina idéer, omfamna nya möjligheter och dra nytta av gedigen bransch- och teknikexpertis.
   

  

 Du kommer att forma din karriär tillsammans med ett företag som är byggt för att växa och bestå. Du får stöd av ledare som bryr sig om din hälsa och ditt välbefinnande och ger dig möjligheter att fördjupa dina kunskaper och vidga dina vyer.
   

  

 Bli en del en av världens största leverantörer av IT- och affärskonsulttjänster.

title: AI/ML Developer
description:
**An Amazing Career Opportunity for an** 
**AI/ML Developer !!**
**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden; hybrid
   

  

**Job ID:** 
 41789
   

  

 Join a forward-thinking engineering team where innovation meets impact. We're looking for an AI/ML Developer with deep expertise in data science and machine learning to design, build, and deploy production-grade models across cloud and on-prem environments. If you're passionate about solving real-world problems with AI and thrive in fast-paced, hands-on development, this is your opportunity to make a difference.
   

  

**Who are we?**
 HID powers the trusted identities of the world’s people, places, and things, allowing people to transact safely, work productively and travel freely.
   

  

 We are a high-tech software company headquartered in Austin, TX, with over 4,500 worldwide employees. Check us out here: www.hidglobal.com and https://youtu.be/23km5H4K9Eo
   

  

**Identity and Access Management Solutions (IAMS):**
 HID Global IAM products protect more than 85 million user identities.
   

  

 HID Global Identity and Access Management Solutions products protect more than 85 million user identities. At HID Global, we understand that no person, device, or workplace can go unprotected. This philosophy of Zero Trust drives us to create new advances in risk-based multi-factor authentication, leads us to secure user identities in converged access environments and drives the need to expand implementations with our industry-leading digital certificates and PKIaaS solution to manage them at scale.
   

  

**As our** 
**AI/ML Developer** 
**, you’ll support HID’s success by:**
* Collaborating closely with the AI Center of Excellence, AI teams, and product teams to align development efforts with strategic goals.
* Designing, implementing, and deploying machine learning models for production use cases (classification, anomaly detection, NLP, and fraud detection).
* Building and maintaining data pipelines, ETL processes, and feature stores for scalable ML experimentation.
* Working with cloud platforms (AWS SageMaker, GCP, Snowflake, Kafka, Docker, Jenkins) to deliver end-to-end AI/ML solutions.
* Developing APIs and microservices to integrate ML models with business applications.
* Conducting experiments with LLMs, multi-agent systems, and synthetic data generation for advanced use cases.
* Ensuring model observability, explainability, and compliance with industry and regulatory standards.
* Collaborating cross-functionally with product, engineering, and business teams to translate requirements into ML-driven solutions.
* Documenting models, processes, and experiments; conducting knowledge transfer and support audits or due diligence.


**Your Experience and Background include:**
* 5+ years of experience in AI/ML, Data Science, or related fields.
* Proven track record in Python development with strong knowledge of NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn, XGBoost, and ML frameworks.
* Experience with AWS Machine Learning ecosystem (SageMaker, boto3, CloudWatch) .
* Strong knowledge of SQL and experience with data warehouses (Snowflake, BigQuery).
* Hands-on with CI/CD, MLOps, and DataOps practices.
* Experience deploying models in Flask/Docker/Jenkins environments.
* Exposure to LLMs, RAG architectures, and AI workflow automation (LangChain, n8n, neo4j) .
* Strong understanding of data governance, quality assurance, and regulatory reporting.
* MSc in Computer Science, Data Science, Machine Learning, or a related technical field.
* Experience working in agile environments and familiarity with cross-functional collaboration.
* Strong focus on user-centered design and iterative development.
* Experience with A/B testing, BI tools (Tableau), and anomaly detection systems.
* Knowledge of responsible AI practices and security standards (OWASP) .
* Committed continuous learner who actively keeps up with the latest developments in AI/ML and is always eager to share insights and knowledge across the organization.
* Strong advocate for diversity, equity, and inclusion in the workplace.
* Results-oriented, with the ability to balance technical depth with business acumen.
* Language Skills
* Ability to effectively communicate in English, both verbally and in writing.
* Proficient in reading and interpreting technical documentation, including journals, specifications, and international standards.


**What we can offer you:**
* Competitive salary and rewards package
* Competitive benefits and annual leave offering, allowing for work-life balance
* A vibrant, welcoming & inclusive culture
* Extensive career development opportunities and resources to maximize your potential
* To be a part of a global organization that is pioneering the hardware, software and services that allow people to confidently navigate the physical and digital worlds


**Why apply?**
* Empowerment: You’ll work as part of a global team in a flexible work environment, learning and enhancing your expertise. We welcome an opportunity to meet you and learn about your unique talents, skills, and experiences. You don’t need to check all the boxes. If you have most of the skills and experience, we want you to apply.
* Innovation: You embrace challenges and want to drive change. We are open to ideas, including flexible work arrangements, job sharing or part-time job seekers.
* Integrity: You are results-orientated, reliable, and straightforward and value being treated accordingly. We want all our employees to be themselves, to feel appreciated and accepted.


 HID is committed to building a diverse, equitable, and inclusive workforce that reflects the global communities we serve. As an equal opportunity employer, we welcome applications from individuals of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We evaluate applicants without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, age, veteran status, or any other legally protected characteristic. Our goal is to create a workplace that empowers everyone to thrive and be their authentic selves, fostering an environment of mutual respect and inclusivity. If you have a disability and require assistance or accommodation to participate in the application process or to perform essential job functions, please contact accommodations-ext@hidglobal.com .
   

  

**We make it easier for people to get where they want to go!**
 On an average day, think of how many times you tap, twist, tag, push or swipe to get access, find information, connect with others or track something. HID technology is behind billions of interactions, in more than 100 countries. We help you create a verified, trusted identity that can get you where you need to go – without having to think about it.
   

  

 When you join our HID team, you’ll also be part of the ASSA ABLOY Group, the global leader in access solutions. You’ll have 63,000 colleagues in more than 70 different countries. We empower our people to build their career around their aspirations and our ambitions – supporting them with regular feedback, training, and development opportunities. Our colleagues think broadly about where they can make the most impact, and we encourage them to grow their role locally, regionally, or even internationally. As we welcome new people on board, it’s important to us to have diverse, inclusive teams, and we value different perspectives and experiences.

title: Business Development Representative
company_industry: Aviation and Aerospace Component Manufacturing and Defense and Space Manufacturing
description:
Location: Stockholm, Sweden
   

  

 Thales people architect identity management and data protection solutions at the heart of digital security. Business and governments rely on us to bring trust to the billons of digital interactions they have with people. Our technologies and services help banks exchange funds, people cross borders, energy become smarter and much more. More than 30,000 organizations already rely on us to verify the identities of people and things, grant access to digital services, analyze vast quantities of information and encrypt data to make the connected world more secure.
   

  

 "As market leader within Digital Identity and Security, Thales makes personal digital interaction simple and secure in an increasingly connected society. From secure software to biometrics and encryption, Thales provides technologies and services that enables business and governments to authenticate identities and protect data, enabling its clients to offer trusted digital services to billions of individuals. Located in Älvsjö since 2012, the site houses both a commercial office as well as two productions within Identity & Biometric Solutions, and Banking & Payment Services. Working commercially across all business areas within Digital Identity and Security, Thales has become a trusted partner within various businesses as well as governments throughout the Nordics.
   

  

**Title:** 
 Business Development Representative
   

  

**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden – Hybrid
   

  

**The position requires that you undergo and be approved in accordance with the applicable regulations for security protection. For positions where Thales has requirements for security clearance, this may entail a requirement for Swedish citizenship.**
**The Opportunity:**
 Join an all-star team of hard-working professionals looking to bridge the gap between marketing and sales organizations, driving lead generation and fostering outbound campaigns. We are a motivated group driving the growth for the business and partnering with our sales team closely in an account-based approach for multiple product lines.
   

  

 You will focus on growing your career and personal goals, as well as hitting our quarterly quotas and having fun along the way. We are critical to the pipeline growth, as it is our job to be the first point of contact within the company for a potential customer. We’re the “first impression” and key to driving account penetration and opportunity creation.
   

  

 You will be responsible for helping to curate the first contact experience and leverage digital outreach and prospecting tools at your disposal. You will work closely with both our marketing demand teams and our sales executives to ensure a positive customer experience across the customer journey. You will speak to C-level executives at Fortune 1000 and Global 2000 companies throughout the region and will quickly learn communication skills that will set you up for furthering your career.
   

  

**YOUR ROLE:**
